function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective air filtering may result in increased particulate matter in the air supply, potentially worsening indoor air quality.","Impact":"Higher risk of indoor air pollution and decreased respiratory health for occupants.","Mitigation":"Implement high-efficiency air filters and regular maintenance to reduce particulate matter in air supply.","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, air purifiers, HVAC systems with advanced filtration.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory conditions or allergies.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC maintenance teams."},{"Description":"Susceptibility of indoor air to environmental tobacco smoke may lead to exposure of occupants to harmful chemicals and increased health risks.","Impact":"Increased health risks for occupants, especially non-smokers, due to exposure to environmental tobacco smoke.","Mitigation":"Implement strict no-smoking policies and use air filtration systems to minimize tobacco smoke in indoor environments.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, air purifiers, smoke detectors, HVAC systems with advanced filtration.","People":"Non-smoking building occupants, children, individuals with respiratory conditions.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, health and safety officers."},{"Description":"Contamination from outdoor environment to indoors may result in higher levels of pollutants indoors, impacting the overall indoor air quality.","Impact":"Increased health risks for occupants due to exposure to outdoor contaminants and pollutants indoors.","Mitigation":"Use of walk-off mats, shoe storage, and regular cleaning to reduce the entry of outdoor contaminants into indoor spaces.","Technologies":"Walk-off mats, shoe storage systems, air purifiers, regular cleaning and maintenance.","People":"Building occupants, especially those with allergies or sensitivities to pollutants.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, cleaning and maintenance teams."},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control may lead to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor air pollution, higher moisture levels, and potential spread of airborne diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement enhanced ventilation systems, exhaust systems, and natural ventilation to improve indoor air quality and minimize the risk of airborne disease transmission.","Technologies":"Enhanced ventilation systems, exhaust fans, natural ventilation designs, HVAC systems with advanced ventilation control.","People":"Building occupants, public health officials, individuals concerned about indoor air quality.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, HVAC engineers, ventilation system designers."}]}
